title: How to Fix Dry Cookie Dough

steps.headline: Place your dough on a piece of baking paper.
Pour over a teaspoon of cooking oil.
Knead and pull the dough together incorporating as much of the oil as possible.
Continue to knead until smooth, soft and bouncy.
Wrap up in the baking paper and place in the fridge for 30 minutes.
Remove your dough from the refrigerator.
steps.description: It will be perfect to work with.

text: Place your dough on a piece of baking paper.  Pour over a teaspoon of cooking oil.  Knead and pull the dough together incorporating as much of the oil as possible.  Add more oil if necessary.  Continue to knead until smooth, soft and bouncy.  Wrap up in the baking paper and place in the fridge for 30 minutes.  Remove your dough from the refrigerator. It will be perfect to work with.
